title: create_new_order
description: Verify that a new order can be created successfully with valid items and total amount, and the API returns a 201 status code.

title: get_order_by_id
description: Verify that an order can be retrieved by its ID successfully, returning the correct order details with a 200 status code.

title: get_users_orders
description: Verify that the API returns the list of orders for the authenticated user with a 200 status code.

title: get_all_users_admin_only
description: Verify that only admin users can retrieve the list of all users, and non-admin users receive a 403 status code.

title: get_user_permissions
description: Verify that the API returns the permissions of the authenticated user with a 200 status code.

title: check_specific_permission
description: Verify that the API correctly checks and returns the status of a specific permission for the authenticated user.

title: get_job_listings
description: Verify that the API returns the list of job listings successfully with a 200 status code.

title: create_new_job
description: Verify that a new job can be created successfully with valid title, company, and description, returning a 201 status code.

title: get_skills_list
description: Verify that the API returns the list of skills successfully with a 200 status code.

title: add_new_skill
description: Verify that a new skill can be added successfully with valid name and category, returning a 201 status code.
